root.name: Urban Trial Freestyle
root.description: System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP SP2, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel Core®2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 or AMD Radeon HD 4650 with 512 MB video memory Hard Drive: 1 GB available spaceRecommendedOS: Windows XP SP2, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel Core®2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 or AMD Radeon HD 5750 with 1024 MB video memory Hard Drive: 1 GB available space
